select rno, bno, btitle, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate from ( select rownum as rno, bno, btitle, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate from ( select bno, btitle, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate from boards order by bno desc ) -- 문자 참조 where rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) where rno >= #{startRowNo}
select bno, btitle, bwriter, bcontent, bhitcount, bdate, battachsname, battachoname, battachtype from boards where bno=#{bno}

insert.if: insert into boards (bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate, bhitcount) values (bno_seq.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, sysdate, 0)

insert into boards (bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate, bhitcount, battachsname, battachoname, battachtype) values (bno_seq.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, sysdate, 0, #{battachsname}, #{battachoname}, #{battachtype})
